pageTitle: BBC One - Open All Hours, Series 4, The Mystical Boudoir of Nurse Gladys Emmanuel, Arkwright Tries to Woo Nurse Gladys
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {7177=Open all Hours ran for four series from 1976 to 1985. From a local grocery store in Yorkshire, Arkwright and his nephew Granville supply the locals with everyday needs. In this excerpt, Arkwright tries to woo neighbour Nurse Gladys at her bedroom window by climbing up a ladder with chocolates., 648=Release date: 11 Feb 2010}
